1080950.name: Kaos
1080950.description:
Kaos is set on an unknown world at an unknown time just after technology has increased enough to do mind and soul transfers... It was suppose to be a path towards utopia!

Based on Third-person shooter that doesn't take itself too seriously (it is a game after all).

Primary goals of Kaos:
  • Fun-ness!
  • Make it interesting, full of things to discover with secrets that can be revealed.
  • Make the rewards worth the effort.
  • Make it possible for anyone to win without cheats (No level caps. No getting "stuck" because the "evil" game is not letting you get past...)
  • Make the "grind" be a personal choice (the more you discover, the less it becomes).
  • Lots of shooting! But not only shooting (we don't want to cause carpal-tunnel on the trigger finger).
Kaos is full of (insert list item below) that we have not found in most games.
  • There is a very unique gun crafting system.
  • Choices matter... from the character you start with to conversations with npc's.
  • Multiple endings... each will add a perk for the next "new game".
  • Much Humor... we do our best to cause laughter!
  • Sometimes emotional... participation is optional.
  • NPC's have been directed to NOT speak AT you... please report violations and they will be investigated.
